word: [ God intended that ] they would seek
str2: To seek, search for, desire, require, demand. Of uncertain affinity; to seek; specially, to worship, or to plot.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.
A form of ara, denoting an interrogation to which a negative answer is presumed.

parse: Verb - Aorist Optative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From the base of psallo; to manipulate, i.e. Verify by contact; figuratively, to search for.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Verb - Aorist Optative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: A prolonged form of a primary heuro, which heureo is used for it in all the tenses except the present and imperfect to find.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Accusative Masculine Singular
str2: To begin, am, exist, be in possession. From hupo and archomai; to begin under, i.e. Come into existence; expletively, to exist (verb).
No, not. Also ouk, and ouch a primary word; the absolute negative adverb; no or not.
At a distance, far away, remote, alien. Feminine accusative case singular of makros; at a distance.
From, away from. A primary particle; 'off, ' i.e. Away, in various senses.
Each (of more than two), every one. As if a superlative of hekas; each or every.
One. (including the neuter Hen); a primary numeral; one.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 1st Person Plural
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
